mapper.update:

toutcity = #{toutcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_ticket set ttype = #{ttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toutcity = #{toutcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tincity = #{tincity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tdate = #{tdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tcompany = #{tcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tsite = #{tsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tinfo = #{tinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tphone = #{tphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
